name: Lexi D
reviews: Not great for dine-in but great coffee selection and unique flavours of chai lattes!

name: Nella Tadic
reviews:
Best coffee in town. Service is always fantastic. But nothing beats the bakery. This Mos Mos is different from the other chains,
the reason they stand out is def because
of the food they serve. So good!!

name: Jen Li
reviews: Great treats and friendly staff! Perfect for that quick pick me up.

name: TL Pun
reviews: Came for a Latte and kids hot chocolate. Both were delicious! Service was friendly and quick.

name: B.J. Y
reviews: Matcha cookies are the best!!!  Will definitely be back!

name: Karen Chan
reviews: Love the variety of drinks and baked treats, especially the matcha latte. Great coffee shop, would highly recommend!!

name: Vickie Fu
reviews: Lots of really good drinks and cookies here! I always get the tiramisu latte 💛 …

name: Anne
reviews: Great coffee and great cinnamon rolls! I also really enjoyed their holiday cookie.

name: Anusree Roy
reviews: Mos Mos has the most incredible matcha in all of Toronto. It’s perfection! And their service is excellent as well.

name: Hanna Derouin
reviews: Hi Anusree - we're glad you enjoyed your visit and the matcha latte! Hope to see you again soon :)

name: Maria Mejia
reviews:
Heard a lot of people recommended the coffee from this cafe and I FINALLY made my visit! 😜Mos Mos Coffee is located in Downtown Toronto and they serve a variety of coffee and pastries💕 (lots of cute donuts, all calling out to me!) This time, I got….

☕️Candamom Chai Latté ☕️
I actually have not tried this latte, I was looking for something that has no sugar and the waiter recommended this to me! 🥰It is one of my favourite now, I will definitely come back and get it again! 🤭The Chai flavour is not as heavy as I thought it would be and every sip I drank was very soothing. 😋If you are looking for something with no sugar but more on the milky side, this is definitely something you should try out! 🤠

🍋 Lemon Poppyseed Loaf 🍋
This was calling out to me, I am totally a fan of lemon poppyseed loaf. 😋Their loaf was very yummy and rich in lemon flavour! It is more on the sweeter side and I wish there were more lemon flavour but totally loved it! 🤠

Other than Lattes, they also serve different coffees like flat white, Americano. 💕I have heard that their Matcha latte is very very good but they cannot do no sugar so I did not get to try this time! 👀Will definitely come back for the Candamom Chai Latte!😌

Thank you for yummy treats! 🤍

name: Saiema Zia
reviews: Hi Vanessa - thank you for visiting and we're glad you enjoyed everything! We have a Ceremonial Matcha that has no sugar and we're able to make the Masala and Ginger Chai unsweetened as well. Come back in the spring/summer for our Lemon Blueberry Loaf if you like lemon! :)

name: aimee l
reviews: I came to the coffee shop since I had a couple hours to spare and wanted to study and do some work. Their wifi has a bunch of sites blocked which meant I only had access to my email. All of my google docs were not accessible and my online drive for school was also not accessible. For the price of the coffee I would at least expect some basic wifi connection. When I spoke with the manager all she said was that she could not help and that its not their wifi thats the problem, that its probably the site or my computer. Which is not true due to me being able to access my work and school from my phone using my data and later being able to access it with no issues at another coffee shop. Clearly they don't care about customer experience.

name: Samantha Woody
reviews: Hi Maria, we apologize we were not able to assist. This is the first time a customer has had issues with accessing a website so we have addressed this issue with IT to have them look into it. Hope to see you again soon.

name: Steff M. Domingos
reviews: Fast and efficient service. Great lattes and love the taro cookies!

name: A Zia
reviews: Hi Michelle - thank you for visiting and glad you enjoyed everything!

name: Nour Alsoori
reviews:
Surprisingly some of the best cookies in town. Crispy edges and chewy center like I wish all cookies are. The boxes are cute and not too expensive.

High recommend the cookies and cream and chocolate caramel. The peanut butter one was a bit of a downer.

name: Hellooo Sunshine
reviews: Hi Flawnson - glad you enjoyed the cookies! And thank you for the tip about the Reese's. Hope to see you again soon!

name: Garret Drumm
reviews: This place is truly something else. Amazing coffee, deliciously addicting cookies/yummy baked treats and a team of wonderful staff. Thank you kindly for your instrumental support for front line nurses. We truly felt the love through the wonderful treats today! Thank you again for making our nursing week a truly special one. I am confident to say, your location has now gained a massive fanbase of operating room nurses ❤️

name: Antonia G
reviews: Hands down best coffee shop! I always come to this shop for a Masala Chai Latte and their cinnamon rolls. They’re staff is always so friendly and patient when you’re ordering. I’ve also order two coffee take-away jugs and the way they prepare everything very top notch! I highly recommend this place if you ever want to treat your office.

name: Dr. Pepper1975
reviews: Enjoyed a pumpkin spice latte with a pumpkin 🎃 cheesecake… absolutely yum! Also, wonderful customer service 😍. Great place to grab coffee on Bay. …

name: Priscilla Aviado
reviews: Cute cafe with very friendly staff

name: Jonathan Chou
reviews: Got a capuccino with oat milk. It was delicious no complaints about that, however the lady taking my order was not friendly and she was frowning literally. I understand everyone has bad days but this is a customer service job, and apparently this is not only my experience based on the reviews I have read. The other two people working there were very smiley. So i cut down a star because of not feeling welcomed.

name: aislinn brown
reviews: Absolutely terrible service. Just awful! That's always been the way with this shop. Management needs training so they can train the staff properly. I walked out without getting anything.

name: Minh Tú Trần
reviews:
(Translated by Google) Very good coffee, even the decaffeinated one. Some milk alternatives to choose from. Lots of sweet pastries and tasty croissants. Not particularly cheap but reasonable for the quality offered

(Original)
Sehr guter, selbst der entkoffeinierte, Kaffee. Einige Milchalternativen zu Auswahl. Viele süße Teilchen und geschmackvolle Croissants. Nicht sonderlich günstig aber für die gebotene Qualität angemessen

name: B. Lin
reviews: Had an iced mocha latte here, it tasted good! my only complaint was that both our paper straws were getting caught in the lid of the cup and it became impossible to move the straw around. But otherwise it was delicious!

name: Abby Sky
reviews:
I LOVE This place!!

Their chai tea latte is the best in the city, in my opinion.

Staff is so friendly and their cakes and cookies are delicious.

ABSOLUTELY recommend this and any of their other locations.

name: Liz Sant
reviews: Odd experience. We stood in front of the counter ready to make our order but neither of the baristas acknowledged us for 5 straight minutes as if we weren’t there. We were confused for people picking up our order but even then a simple hello would’ve been appropriate?The cold brew was mediocre. Not coming back.

name: Elvin Kao
reviews: Amazing Americanos! Sweet barista. Good cookies 👌🏻 and biggggg donuts! Love the vibe!

name: Lillian JT.
reviews:
[ ] will visit whenever I come to the city
[x] will recommend to others
[ ] no regret, but won’t visit again
[ ] I’d rather eat McDonald’s
[ ] I was angry

Great coffee, I feel more focused at work
From brain of Brian

name: L
reviews: Thank you for visiting us! Glad you enjoyed the coffee!

name: Julio Fernandez
reviews: Try the Americano with cream - so good! Friendly staff and clean environment.

name: Johnathan Agaton
reviews: You have a coffee shop and you dont know what fruity, acidic, roasty mean for espresso flavours?

name: Sameer Kumar
reviews:
I love the coffee and cardamom Chai.
Good place to have a break.

name: Jayanthi Palanivel
reviews: Nice little coffee shop with interesting menu selection. I tried the Kenyan Chai Latte which was described to be comparable to HK milk tea. The drink was smooth but a bit too much milk to tea flavour for my taste. Space is clean. Baristas are friendly.

name: Tiffany Santos
reviews:
Their must be a reason why they are always busy.
Love their varieties of Chai Latte, and the bakery items especially.
Priced unreasonably competitive, with high quality. 3 thumbs up !!!
I would never go to their competitors again !

name: Fanzhu Deng
reviews: The best

name: El-Candy Ajayi
reviews: Amazing cafe! Had mango chai tea latte, cafe mocha, banana chocolate bread. All of them are just amazing.

name: Lee Balki
reviews: This is a great little coffee place. I had chai latte, Flat white and cardamom latte. All of them were fantastic!

name: Peter Chiem
reviews: Love the taro latte and Kenyan milk tea chai latte!

name: Ron Leung
reviews: This is my morning coffee stop - great coffee, love the staff.  Whatever you do though, don't start eating the bloomer's donuts because you won't be able to stop!

name: MADHURA BHOSALE
reviews: I heard really good things about the chai. Maybe I had the wrong kind, but I was disappointed

name: Aditi Jadhav
reviews: Excellent service and latte. One of my favourite coffee shops in the city, love this place!

name: C
reviews: The lattés here are easily one of the best in the city, and their doughnuts are delicious! Shout out to Elisha for always providing an amazing experience!

name: Catherine Nguyen
reviews:
Didnt like the matcha cookie.. felt like i was eating raw cookie dough.. it was stale and thick.. and gave a raw taste.. way too sweet to be called it as “matcha dark chocolate” cookie.. tried hazelnut cookie and triple chocolate.. it is average..
Must try tiramisu latte.. 2 stars overall

name: Madeleine Pigeon
reviews: Croissant shocked me, delic! Great capp too

name: Mitch Tucker
reviews: Thanks for visiting us! Try our freshly baked cinnamon rolls next time!

name: Kyle Chin
reviews: not sure why this place is so popular, I’m convinced people don’t like real coffee. portion size is way overboard, ordered a medium and it’s even bigger than Starbucks which is bigger than any boutique cafe already. most importantly, the latte tastes like water downed milk. I can’t even taste the espresso….

name: Efraim Pestana
reviews:
Price: everything is worth it

My experience: I tried the taro latte and wow 🤤 there are so many things I want to try like the red tea latte, matcha and more. The bloomers donuts are beautiful, large and a great option alongside the many fresh baked snacks offered. So happy to have come across this chain and hope to see so many more around Toronto. 100% recommend 💯

name: Swaraj Kashyap
reviews: Thanks for visiting us Megha! We have many more delicious drinks and freshly baked goods for you to try ;)

name: fla1124
reviews: The Vegan Donuts were decent.

name: Elaina K.
reviews: Tried the taro drink and got a box of assorted cookies. Everything tasted great! Service was fast and friendly.

name: Larissa Chan
reviews: Thank you for visiting us! Let us know which cookie what was your fave!

name: Diana Nguyen
reviews: Great staff. They sell ethically sourced coffee

name: Célia Chalfoun
reviews: Great little coffee shop! Got the gingerbread latte and caramel latte, both with oat milk. Also picked up a bag of their espresso that the barista so kindly ground for us, makes a great at home latte

name: pritesh khona
reviews: Thank you for visiting us! Try our take-home chai lattes next time!

name: Haddie majnoon
reviews: On my stay in Toronto recently I decided to get Iced Caramel Macchiatos from here, they were certainly not flavorful but it did it's job at tasting like coffee.

name: Charmaine Borja
reviews: Never Dissapoints! Some great Coffee ☕

name: Monis A.
reviews: Love the coffee. My go to is the Maple Latte. Their seasonal menu is great.

name: Emre YILMAZ
reviews: Had a cold brew and power cookie. Cold brew was not bitter and the power cookie was nice.

name: Lotus Cedar
reviews: The Masala/Cardamom chais are amazing and service is always friendly. Numerous plant-based milk options. They also have a delicious vegan carrot loaf as well as Bloomer's vegan donuts.

name: Satwik Pattanaik
reviews: Great chai latte selection.

name: hareesh tummala
reviews: My most favourite coffee shop in GTA. The food is great too!

name: Tammy S
reviews: The concept is simpler than ordering at Starbucks which can be confusing at times even on the app. Service is consistently friendly across all locations. This newer location also has Bloomer's vegan donuts which are not cheap but pretty good with unusual flavours. Their teas are frothed with table cream instead of normal cream and the combo is divine with a bit of sweetness.

name: Pepe Pipo Ania Gonzalez
reviews: Glad you enjoyed your experience!

name: Jeremy Hunsinger
reviews: Home to the best baked goods (original chocolate chip cookie ❤️👌🏼😋) and amazing chai lattes 🌟 …

name: Kay K
reviews: Thanks for your kind words Charmaine!

name: meric davidson
reviews: One of the best coffee you will have !

name: Gravityfinal
reviews: Glad you enjoyed Frank!

name: Tammy Kent
reviews: Coffee was okay. The cup literally collaped from the bottom when I pressed to secure the lid.. got coffee all over my hands. Later at home I noticed the cup was dissolving from the inside and I had a few paper bits in my mouth because it had no wax lining.. Its made from the same material inside as outside - how completely bizarre. The staff were super friendly and helpful so 5 starts for that. The staff are aware of the collapsing issue with the cups.

name: Robert Dumaresq
reviews: Hi Monis - thanks for bringing this to our attention. Feel free to e-mail us contactus@mosmoscoffee.com to further resolve the issue if you are interested :)

name: Karthik
reviews: I love the vegan donuts they are amazing!

name: Phil
reviews: Glad you enjoyed Mike!

name: JD JS
reviews:
(Translated by Google) They have aromatic and delicious coffees...

(Original)
Aromalı ve lezzetli kahveleri var...

name: Steve Chung
reviews:
(Translated by Google) I'm glad you had fun!

(Original)
Eğlendiğine sevindim!

name: Khalid Saad
reviews: I had a Cappuccino as per my wife's suggestion. I left it is a bit over rated.

name: Jaya
reviews: Hi Hareesh - if you're looking for more espresso flavour, we suggest a Cortado, if you're looking for a more milky flavour - we suggest a latte. Hope you find your new drink with us!

name: Xiaodi Chen
reviews: Yummy treats. Hot chocolate good but not stirred well chunky at bottom. When I asked for a napkin, she gave me 1 dirty one! Atleast provide clean napkins to paying customers.

name: Hunda o Harman
reviews: Hi Tammy - sorry about your experience, feel free to email us so we can make up for this contactus@mosmoscoffee.com

name: Mat A. (Nosnoma)
reviews: Favourite go-to coffee franchise. MosMos has a great coffee selection. I usually get the Masala Chai Latte. It is really good! Amazing staff and amazing coffee! Will be back!

name: Andrea Gnanatheepan
reviews: Glad you enjoyed Willy! Looking forward to you trying our other Chai Lattes!

name: daniel leaño
reviews: Great coffee and vegan donuts yum

name: Daphne Chan
reviews: Glad you enjoyed Jeremy! Hope to see you soon!

name: Mavis Li
reviews:
Edited: I went back and bought this beautiful Tiramisu vegan donut topped with a luscious  "marscapone cream cheese" and dusted with cocoa and a whisper of espresso powder...devine! I attached a picture of the beauty, below....try it, you won't be sorry!

I would have given them 5 stars but, the female behind the counter was not in a good mood...you're in the customer service business try to act like you like your job or at least be nice. When asked where the vegan donuts are don't just point, use your vocal chords. Anyways, the coffee was great; flavourful,  smoky and full of nutty and caramel notes and perfectly bitter. The "Bloomers" vegan donuts are amazing! Fluffy but dense and delicious.  I had the maple donut and it was fantabulous! I'd be back for the product but not the service.

name: Reina Davé
reviews: Glad you enjoyed the product Kay! We're well known for our friendly and quick service, you'll have a better experience next time!

name: Urmil Setia
reviews:
The Vegan Donuts were decent. The dough is amazing and fresh but the frosting is a bit too sweet and wasn’t great.
The drinks were perfect, not too sweet and just right. Tiramisu Roll and the cookies were also great, fresh, soft and just right.

name: Conner Harris
reviews: Love that this place is offering Bloomers donuts!!

name: Kathleene Sim
reviews: Coffee and Bloomer's Donuts are here to stay! Glad you enjoyed it!

name: Eszter Markó
reviews: Awesome coffee and cookies.

name: Anna Bond
reviews: Glad you enjoyed Karthik!

name: Adi Kuperman
reviews: Love this place and the staff!!! Can't say enough good things!!

name: Mal Grewal
reviews: Thanks for kind comment! Looking forward to seeing you again!

name: Paulo Valadares
reviews:
If you're reading this, you're probably wondering if MosMos is any good and the answer is YES!

They have a wide drink selection and the staff there are very courteous. I go so often that the staff know my coffee preference by heart! And Helen, one of the baristas, makes an effort to memorize every customer's name thus making each interaction very personal which I LOVE!

OHH THEY ALSO SELL BLOOMER DONUTS!!! YA'LL GOTTA GET THERE EARLY BECAUSE THEY SELL OUT SOMETIMES!

name: Monia Naguib
reviews: Thanks for the kind review Steve! We're glad you enjoy Mos Mos and hope to see you again soon!

name: Mike Salter
reviews: The ceremonial matcha is amazing 🤩 …

name: DJ LeGrow
reviews: Glad you enjoy it Alexandra! Give the Maple Matcha a try next time!

name: Divya Mohan
reviews: The tiramisu latte was AMAZING 😍. The tiramisu donut was ok but too sweet for me. …

name: Divya Mohan
reviews: Next time try the Iced Tiramisu or a Lao Latte! Glad you enjoyed the drink!

name: Dana Ayyash
reviews: Good outside seating, didn’t like the bakery or the flat white though..the staff are good

name: joe hill
reviews: Hi Khalid, we're well known for our baked goods and drinks - if you want to give us another try, let us know! Looking forward to seeing you again.

name: C
reviews: Ordered the tiramisu latte (small) today and I could barely out it down. The sugar is just right and the drink tastes like liquid dessert. I would 10/10 recommend. It's perfect for cold days, warm days and even gloomy ones!

name: Alicja Bobrowska
reviews: Thanks Jaya! Glad you enjoyed it and hope to see you back for some more!

name: Trish Hudyma
reviews: Unprofessional staff

name: Jason Kwan
reviews: Hi Hunda, sorry to hear about your experience. We're well known for our friendly and quick service, hope you give us another try!

name: Stella Andreou
reviews:
Sugar + Sugar + Sugar
I asked for just an iced matcha.
Not top level matcha mixed with sweetener and milk. (I think the sweetener was in the milk). The pastry I got was overly sweet as well.

name: Laurance Wiese
reviews: Sorry to hear about your experience Matthew, we do not have any sweeteners that we add to our hot or cold Matcha, it comes naturally sweet! We also have a Cermonial Matcha (with 0G of sugar). Hope this helps for next time!

name: Richard F.
reviews: Great service and quality drinks!

name: Alisa Dermawan
reviews: Thanks for the kind words Andrea! Hope to see you again

name: Clive Foran
reviews: We ordered a medium iced matcha latte with oat milk and a small hot matcha half-sweet with oat milk (pictured) from the Bay Street location on an early Sunday morning. Mos Mos is my favourite coffee shop and my first time at this location didn’t disappoint. The staff were friendly and upbeat, and the service was quick. Highly recommend grabbing a drink and going to Nathan Phillips Square to enjoy the views and fresh air (only if there are no protests going on!!).

name: Claire Hoon
reviews: Glad you enjoyed it Reina! Hope to see you at more and more locations soon!

name: Jessica Z
reviews: Toronto is a city of some pretty terrible coffee. Seems like every cute little hole in the wall serves the same burned-tasting swill, so it’s nice to have a non-massive-chain option like Mos Mos that serves great coffee consistently and with staff that are super friendly, quick and organized.

name: sana inamdar
reviews: Thanks for the kind review Jason! We hope to see you soon!

name: Shawn Khan
reviews:
Average tasting expensive doughnuts with a side of uninterested and unpleasant cashier.

And she didn’t even have to sense to provide a napkin along with the order.

name: Nel Villanueva
reviews: Hi Urmil - our donuts are handcrafted, baked fresh straight from Bloomer's, the best vegan donuts in the city! Please email us if you'd like to give this another try contactus@mosmoscoffee.com, thanks!

name: Dr. Camy Grewal
reviews: There’s always something amiss with this particular Mos Mos shop. Either they tell me Espresso bean only have blonde roast (when they actually have medium roast) or this time, packed me a dark roast coffee bean instead of an espresso bean! Because the packaging was updated, I even asked the staff to checked if the coffee bean was for espresso and the staff told me it was. Please train your staff better on product knowledge so your customer does not have to make multiple trips back for return/exchange!

name: Andrij Matvijchuk
reviews: Hi Tina, sorry to hear about your experience. Please email us as we'd like to make it up to you! contactus@mosmoscoffee.com

name: Arjun Rudra
reviews: I had some trouble hearing the cashier so they spoke louder of course, but the overall interaction and attitude just felt very dismissive after that. I just think I visited on an off day for them. I love their drink selection and the variety of options for coffee and tea. The cookies are really delicious and fresh! I also loved how fluffy and big the vegan donut was. Although, I may have gotten the wrong flavour; I let them choose for me, and the one I received had a very tart, strong, sweet, fruitiness to it that just wouldn't sit right with me as I personally enjoy more mellow flavours. I also ordered the mango Chai latte with soy milk. That also didn't really work with me for similar reasons... but I will make another visit very soon and make some safer choices and adjust my review accordingly if the experience improves!

name: Dayna N
reviews: Hi Kathleene looking forward to your next visit! Perhaps it was just a miscommunication on our end, we're known for our great customer service. Glad you enjoy the cookies and drinks!

name: John McPherson
reviews: I had a nice experience at Mos Mos. I love the name and the concept behind the brand. Even though the staff experienced an extreme technical issue today, they were welcoming, kind and friendly. I have tried the medium flat white which tasted overly milky. Next time I would go with the smallest size to taste the coffee.

name: Ozzie Castillo
reviews: Hi Eszter glad you enjoy Mos Mos! If you're looking for a stronger drink, we'd recommend the Canadiano - it has twice the amount of espresso!

name: Jeff Balson
reviews: Friendly, helpful staff. Oh, and the coffee is great too.

name: S Y
reviews: Glad you enjoyed Anna! Hope to see you back again soon!

name: Sonia Abraham
reviews: OK coffee. The cookies were too sweet.

name: Alexander Chen
reviews: Hi Adi - our cookie are actually more on the less sweet side! If you'd like to give us another try, please email us contactus@mosmoscoffee.com and we will change your mind on this! Look forward to seeing you again.

name: Daniela Trecapelli-Salituro
reviews:
Wow blown away by the deliciousness of the Canadiano coffee.
By far the best coffee in the area

name: Cherryl Ann Koylass
reviews: Glad you enjoyed Laurence! Hope to see you again soon!

name: Gale S.
reviews:
This place has become one of my favorite coffee shop. And I don't even like coffee that much.
Friendly staff. Well knowledge. And nice matcha options, though, not all locations have the same menu. My favorite location is in the PATH under the CIBC building.

name: Sharon Lam
reviews: Hi Paulo, glad you enjoy Mos Mos and thanks for the kind words! Hope to see you again soon! All stores have almost identical drinks but yes we do have different cookies/loaves/goodies at different locations.

name: Ben Mather
reviews: Excellent coffee and pastries

name: Mohamad Hammoud
reviews: Glad you enjoyed Mike! Looking forward to seeing you again!

name: Alleya Sairah
reviews: Best coffee I've ever had in my life. Full stop.

name: Mandy Kuo
reviews: Thank you for the kind words. Glad you enjoy our coffee!

name: Sabdanaa Jeyakumaran
reviews: Best mocha latte I’ve had in a while! The cocoa they use is so rich, it makes the mocha taste great.

name: Trevor Pedley
reviews: Glad you enjoyed the Mocha Latte Dana! Hope to see you soon. Give the Tiramisu Latte a try next time!

name: David Sit
reviews: Great coffee, reasonable price, doesn't taste bitter

name: Victoria Wolf
reviews: Great products, friendly staff. Wish there was a tip option when paying by card.

name: Anita Stavri
reviews: omg they've got the biggest baddest donuts they are delicious i share mine cause it's humongous go there you won't be disappointed

name: Benita Lee Cassidy
reviews:
(Translated by Google) Beautiful coffee shop.

(Original)
Красивая кофейня.

name: Saloua Abdelhadi
reviews: Bought cookies for my staff and self for Christmas. They were great in accommodating for a food allergy. Everyone loved the cookies. Nicely packed in a great carry container. I tried the nutella milk chocolate drizzle cookie and it was amazing. Would recommend to others.

name: Michael B
reviews: Merry Christmas Stella! We're glad your team enjoyed the cookies, looking forward to seeing you again!

name: Chloë A. L. Jennings
reviews: Best coffee in Toronto!!

name: Donna Saleh
reviews: Thanks for the kind words Laurance, glad you like the coffee!

name: WN W
reviews:
Great coffee place offering delectable desserts & cookies too! My wife loves the matcha latte here & cant pass by without grabbing one to go.

Mos Mos is so much better than Starbucks! The service is outstanding as well. We were served by a tall, younger gentleman & he was very friendly, personable & informative. He recommended the salted Caramel Milk cookie & it was awesome! Great recommendation.

The place is very clean, functional & presentation is great too. I’ll be back soon for the Mars bar cookie next! Excellent job Mos Mos! 💯

name: Marc Roger Labrecque
reviews: Hi Richard thank you for the kind words! We're glad you enjoyed and looking forward to see you again for that Mars bar cookie!

name: M K
reviews: The donuts look very good! I bought 2 and the top didn’t have much flavor and the amount of unflavored dough was not satisfying. I’m glad I didn’t buy a dozen which is what I usually eat. Try it out if you want but I’m going to Tim Hortons which has better donuts than here and that’s not saying much.

name: Jelena Grabeljsek
reviews: Hi Jesse! Sorry about to hear about your experience. These donuts are Toronto's best vegan donuts baked daily from Bloomers! We'd love for you to give them another try - everyone loves them. If you'd like to give them another try just e-mail us contactus@mosmoscoffee.com

name: Leslie L
reviews: Thank you to Victor, Cecile, Aehee, Aranza, Jaemin, Jenna, and Helen for always making our drinks with a smile on their faces. I go to this location on a weekly basis from work with a huge order and they are always so patient with me. Their selection of drinks and treats are incredible and everything I’ve tried, I’ve loved. It is truly the highlight of my week!

name: Taras K
reviews: Thanks of the kind words Kajal! The team is always happy to see you!

name: Katelyn Lei
reviews: Always great service.

name: Bruce Ryan
reviews: Glad you enjoyed Clive! Hope to see you soon!

name: Amy Truong
reviews:
Easily some of the best chai lattes I've ever had! Lots of cafes with mediocre chai lattes go overboard with the cinnamon or the milk, but the ones here taste very balanced.

I had the cardamom and mango ones and they were both very delicious, with the rich taste of chai permeating the whole drink. I like how there's a complex aftertaste - you can taste the milk, the chai and your flavour of choice.

Note that the sugar level and toppings are adjustable, which is great for a little bit of customization. I personally found half sugar the right amount of sugar.

Also: my pickup order was packed with care and the staff was very friendly. 90% of cafes here don't give me a tray or paper bag unless I ask, but I got both without any prompting. Great service!

name: Claudia C
reviews: Thanks for the detailed review Claire! We have more Chai Lattes waiting for you to try on your next trip in!

name: Patrick Lynch
reviews: Taro latte is the best!

name: 냥두부
reviews: Glad you enjoyed Jessica! We also have a Taro Cookie!

name: Mary Carrino
reviews: awesome staff and cannot ignore their awesome beverages and bake goods..😘 …

name: Ian Waudby-Smith
reviews: Glad you enjoyed Sana! Hope to see you soon!

name: DOUG MCKIBBIN
reviews: My go to spot when I need to satisfy that sugar craving. The signature lattes are so good it should be criminal. Don't get me started on their baked goods, especially the fitness cookie.

name: Kaps T Dot
reviews: Thanks for the kind words Shawn! Hope to see you soon!

name: Jost Bergerich
reviews: Glad you enjoyed Nel!

name: Felix Chiu
reviews: Really great little coffee shop, good coffee and baked goods. Very polite and thoughful service.

name: A O
reviews: Thanks for the kind words Andrij! We hope to see you again soon!

name: Khyati Vasavada
reviews: Tried their rosewater/pistachio doughnut and it was delicious. It was large and fluffy, the rosewater flavour comes through but not overpowering. I couldn't tell the difference if it was vegan. Would recommend!

name: Leanne Wilton
reviews: Glad you enjoyed Shivani! Hope to see you again soon!

name: Jay Soulliere
reviews:
I've ordered from here a few times (uber eats) and the food has been fantastic and fresh everytime.

A little on the pricey side, but worth it.

name: zubair sabzali
reviews: Excellent coffee. Great service. The tuxedo cookie was excellent. The stylized world map was an excellent conversation starter. The level of service was interesting. A very unique way of ordering
